TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ApplicationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组与应用程序相关的标准命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of application related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令类和命令中的其他命令库类，如和，用于表示一组的应用程序程序员经常遇到的常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示的实例和不该命令的实现逻辑。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑绑定到与命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command with a . 例如，如果控件，后者将执行的逻辑上执行命令命令可能无法提供由该控件，因此应用程序编写器将负责编写逻辑，用于确定如何将控件处理命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control, the logic which performs the command may not be provided by the control, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the control will handle the command. 许多控件对于许多命令库中的命令提供的实现逻辑。Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，类提供了逻辑， ， ， ，并命令。For example, the class provides logic for the , , , , and commands. 有关详细信息命令和命令，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CancelPrint As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ CancelPrint { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“取消打印”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Cancel Print command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示取消打印作业的意图。This command indicates intention to cancel a print job. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 该命令的实现在许多情况下该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` > ```

summary.span: 获取表示“关闭”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Close command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示想要关闭的项 （通常为文件）。This command indicates intention to close an item (typically a file). 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 该命令的实现在许多情况下该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

summary.span: 获取表示上下文菜单命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Context Menu command.

description.span: 鼠标笔势不会附加到此命令，但大多数应用程序会遵循使用右击笔势调用上下文菜单的约定。

span.span: A Mouse Gesture is not attached to this command, but most applications follow the convention of using the Right Click gesture to invoke the context menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示打开上下文菜单的意图。This command indicates intention to open the context menu. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 该命令的实现在许多情况下该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Correction List command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示打开更正列表的意图。This command indicates intention to open the correction list. 更正列表是根据上下文不同。The correction list is different depending on the context. 例如，对于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)]输入更正列表标识了重新转换会选择。For example, with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] input the correction list identifies reconversion choices. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 该命令的实现在许多情况下该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

summary.span: 表示始终被忽略的命令。

span.span: Represents a command which is always ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令始终忽略，并且不处理导致它的输入的事件。This command is always ignored and does not handle the input event that caused it. 这提供了一种方法来关闭现有的控件中内置的输入绑定。This provides a way to turn off an input binding built into an existing control. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 该命令的实现在许多情况下该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
